name: Veg Raider Rabbit
description:
Guide wild Veg Raider Rabbit to collect the vegetable pickups whilst avoiding traffic, water, cliffs and other obstacles. Dive down rabbit tunnels to access new areas and avoid danger. 12 levels of vertically scrolling, twitch based, arcade action fun!

Can you collect all the vegetables and make it home?

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right
